description: '''Shock rock''' is the combination of [[rock music]] or [[heavy metal music]] with highly theatrical live performances emphasizing [[shock value]].  Performances may include violent or provocative behavior from the artists, the use of attention-grabbing imagery such as costumes, masks, or face paint, or [[special effects]] such as [[pyrotechnics]] or [[Theatrical blood|fake blood]]. Shock rock also often includes elements of [[horror and terror|horror]].
